message:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3nf89vGjKR4
https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1873876300

🍉

So here is your one and only chance
所以此刻是你的唯一机会
Life is an opportunity
生活即为机遇
All that is near us we must know
我们身边所知的一切
Could disappear any day be careful
可能转瞬即逝，要小心
The main key to finding happiness
寻找快乐的关键
Lies nowhere else but in our souls
不在他处在于心

Some people may call a kind deed,
有人会把我做的善事
An act of me ,hypocrisy
称作虚伪
But never mind those who have lost faith
但永远不要理会那些失去信仰的人
You shouldn't give in to what they say
你不该屈服于他们的话语
As a matter of fact let me tell you
让我来告诉你一件事
Even if it was for selfish cause
即使是为一己私欲
The salvageable hypocrisy
可挽救的虚伪
Is to cure the murders honestly
也可以真诚地治愈邪恶
Everybody tells you from time to time
人们时不时告诉你
To never give up ,like a phrase from a movie
不要放弃，就像电影里的话
They tell you to stand up for yourself
他们告诉你为自己而战

As if it was always that easy
似乎一切那么简单
Gather a handful of courage in my heart
汇聚勇气于心间
Take a walk and survive for another day
出发，度过下一天
And I'll never take it for granted
我会铭记于心
Let's go！~
一路向前！~
title: 👁️‍🗨️ 闭上眼，西瓜是怎样的物体，红色是怎样的颜色?　/　不想被代表、不想被幸福、活着的意义—— ✨
userSign: (柔和好天气、轻轻抛起一颗苹果...)
